content:
I opened a WIP PR for the equivalence between compact Hausdorff spaces and algebras for the ultrafilter monad.
Any comments are welcome! #4555

@Reid Barton I borrowed the definition of CompHaus you mentioned at some point on zulip. I hope you don't mind. Most of this work is around Compactum which is defined as the category of algebras for ultrafilter.
@Bhavik Mehta I'm looking forward to you PRing Grothendieck topologies so we can define sheaves on compacta :wink:
